title: MD
biography: Professor Dato' Lam Sai Kit is a prominent Malaysian scientist who was central to the discovery of the Nipah virus that causes severe disease in both animals and humans. Prof Lam is currently an emeritus professor at the Faculty of Medicine, University of Malaya as well as a Research Consultant at University of Malaya.
aiSummary: Lam Sai Kit is a virology specialist with an H-index of 40 at University of Malaya (Member). Has been published in Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America, Science Signaling. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
